info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 12:50PM EST until January 09 at 4:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM EST /3 PM CST/ THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM EST /3 AM CST/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of up to around one tenth of an inch...mainly on roads and sidewalks. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana, southwest Michigan and northwest Ohio. * WHEN...From 4 PM EST /3 PM CST/ this afternoon to 4 AM EST /3 AM CST/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible due to icy roads. Secondary roads, bridges and overpasses, parking lots, and sidewalks are most susceptible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Icy conditions are likely to develop by evening and persist for several hours before temperatures rise above freezing overnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages.
